<title level="1" right="Rules">[Verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 303 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A verbal component is a vocalization of words of power. You must speak them in a strong voice, so it’s hard to conceal that you’re Casting a Spell. The spell gains the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait. You must be able to speak to provide this component.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
